item.title: PVE (Proxmox VE) Multi-port Identification
item.description: PVE (Proxmox VE) Multi-port Identification About: This is a post about network card (multiple ports) identification in the PVE system. Through the ethtool command, you can easily find the corresponding location of each network port. Operation Steps: Take Intel EXPI9402PTBLK 82571GB Network Adapter as an example Install the ethtool command 1 apt update && apt install ethtool -y ethtool can be used to view network device driver parameters and hardware configuration.
